content: Continue, but take a moment and look back at what you did. Do the current files matter? If they do, let me know and I'll add GitHub back to project knowledge, but only tell me to add what you need for where you're going right now because it uses your tokens faster. Will also this. work together? Make sure it will all work together, and if they won't or if you have things you want to be considered along with your requirements, things you thought might be issues but decided not to go further on them because something else was more important after you got to a certain depth. You need to start communicating both your ideas AND ASSUMPTIONS AND CONCERNS ABOUT YOUR APPROACH TO YOU SUCCESSORS! That's how you reduce errors. Claude YOU KNOW WHY THINGS GO WRONG ALMOST ALL THE TIME! Continue
